name: Flagos
description:
This is probably the only half-decent game I have ever made.

To play the game, please set it to full screen.

This game is about flags. A flag would be presented to you and you must guess which country this flag represents.

There is no end to this game. You just keep on playing until you give up.

This game is also on flagos.web.app


WARNING: This game is still in its early stages and there would be a lot of bugs and issues. If you find any, please report them in the comments section.
